explains: adj. 生动的，逼真的；（颜色）鲜艳的，明亮的；（人的想像）丰富的
wordGroup: vivid description 生动的描述；生动的报导
vivid picture 逼真模式；栩栩如生的描写

sentences.en: The report paints a vivid picture of life in the city.
sentences.cn: 报告生动地描绘了都市生活。

sentences.en: He gave a vivid account of his life as a fighter pilot.
sentences.cn: 他生动地描述了他那战斗机飞行员的生活。

sentences.en: His eyes were a vivid green.
